QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(i.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when i.encid = '' or i.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(i.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, i.ins_type, i.insurance_date, i.insurance_time from {sc}.insurance i JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND i.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE order by cast(replace(i.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
